title: Add upbeat royalty-free background music options

requirements.text: Replace the current single hard-coded background track (/assets/relaxing-music.mp3) with a configurable set of upbeat, positive-vibe royalty-free music tracks served as static frontend assets, and update the player logic to load/play the selected track.

quotes: Is it possible to add royalty free music to my webside?

acceptanceCriteria: The app no longer hard-codes "/assets/relaxing-music.mp3" as the only available track.
At least one upbeat track is referenced via a single, clearly editable track list (e.g., an array of {title, src, attribution}).
Selecting a different track (via UI added in REQ-2) switches playback to the chosen track and continues looping.
If audio playback is blocked by the browser, the app does not crash and the UI remains usable.

requirements.text: Enhance the existing music controls on MainPage to support upbeat background music playback with: play/pause, volume control, and track selection; ensure all user-facing labels are in English and match an upbeat/positive tone.
acceptanceCriteria: The header music button still toggles play/pause.
A volume control is available and changes the playback volume immediately.
A track selector UI is available (dropdown, list, or buttons) showing track titles.
The UI indicates the current track name when music is playing.
All user-facing text related to music (e.g., status indicator) is updated from “Relaxing music playing” to wording that matches upbeat/positive vibes (in English).

requirements.text: Add a small in-app attribution section for the included royalty-free music (e.g., track title + author/source/license text), displayed in the UI (footer or near the music controls).

quotes: Is it possible to add royalty free music to my webside?

acceptanceCriteria: For each available track, there is attribution metadata stored alongside the track configuration.
The app displays attribution text for the currently selected track in a readable but unobtrusive way.
Attribution is visible without requiring developer tools or viewing source code.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components must be composed, not edited).
Do not modify immutable hook/entry files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: Implementing third-party music streaming integrations or pulling music from external APIs.
Adding user accounts or permissions for uploading music.
Changing the daily quote rotation logic in the backend.

preferencesToAdd: Prefers upbeat and positive vibe background music.
